concept.title: Confirm deleting selected cache items
concept.shortdesc: The Confirm deleting selected cache items dialog box enables you to review a list of cached point cloud files that were selected to be deleted.

conbody.p: This gives you a final opportunity to cancel the operation before permanently removing them from the cache.

section.title: Dataset
section.p: Displays a list of cached point cloud files that you selected to delete from the cache. It includes their names and locations.

section.title: Size
section.p: Displays the amount of cache used for each of the selected point cloud files.

section.title: OK
section.p: Deletes the point cloud files from the cache. Any drawings that reference these files will be unable to find them.

section.title: Cancel
section.p: Closes the dialog box without deleting point cloud files from the cache.
